charges.charge_disposition: Deft is hereby committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 46 months. Deft to surrender before 2:00 p.m. on 12/10/98. Upon release from imprisonment, deft shall be on Supervised Release for a term of 3 years. Restitution in the amount of $1,937,578.50. to TACC International Corp. Special Assessment of $500.00. (1)

Deft is hereby committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 46 months. Deft to surrender before 2:00 p.m. on 12/10/98. Upon release from imprisonment, deft shall be on Supervised Release for a term of 3 years. Restitution in the amount of $1,937,578.50. to TACC International Corp. Special Assessment of $500.00. (2-6)

Deft is hereby placed ono probation for a term of 5 years. Dft shall serve the first 18 months in home detention, with electronic monitoring, and pay a fee of $4.55 each day under electronic monitoring. Special Assessment $500.00. Restitution in the amount of $1, 937,578.50. (1)
